creditline: Lent by DRG, DRG Collection and Darwin and Geri Reedy
description: mask with oval face, slit eyes, mouth with exposed teeth; band of black pigment under nose; black and dark red pigment on arching eyebrows; 3 triangular decorations on either side of head painted with dark red pigment; dark pigment on top of head extending around sides of head; 2 pieces of raffia braided together wrap around chin, attaching at sides of head near top, tied through to inside of mask at chin through several holes
title: Mask
